name: Jan Shiksha, Sanskritik Prashikshan Avam Gramin Karm Society (Spectra)

address: Block E 11 Patel Nagar Mannaka Road

briefDescription: SPECTRA is a professionally managed committed org. active in community capacity building and issue based networking. The primary focus of SPECTRA is on the problems of the poor in their struggle to obtain a life of justice and dignity. Child Rights, women development and awareness generation, Environment stabilization, food security, sanitation, education, rural industries for income generation, and empowerment of the community for self-governance are the most important components of its mission. Child and women Rights, Gender justice, natural resource management, and livelihood security are our primary areas of concern.
